posts.postText: I permabanned Doc today. Steam_0:1:19905072 . He was on TTT and was hacking and using Aimbot. He was asked to stop and was VAC banned. Just letting you guys know.
I think i have seen him in the past on other NNJG servers. Oh well, serves him right.
I only banned him from TTT, but if he causes problems on any other server, dont hesitate to ban him.
Ben, I need you to add SourceBans. When a user is banned, the user is banned from every server you connect it with.

Well, it looks like sourcebans was added after all.
Old topic, locked.
